title: Star Wars: Squadrons Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.01.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate can be!

Head to http://logitechg.com and use code KFGAMES for 10% off select products!

Go to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily to get started with a FREE online visit!

Greg and Tim talk about Steve in Minecraft, Star Wars reviews, Crash reviews, and so much more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:50 - Housekeeping
Donktober begins this Saturday. 
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes),Black Jack, Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:09:09 - Star Wars Squadrons Review Round-Up
00:15:12 - Can a game like Star Wars Squadrons help make VR breakthrough to the mainstream? - Best Friends Q:Great mrlizard
00:22:10 - Crash 4 Review Round-Up
00:29:20 - Steve in Minecraft, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:36:45 - Soooo Minecraft on smash.... think this means gamepast on switch? - Best Friends Q:Jords
00:38:25 - Apex Crossplay Arrives October 6th
00:41:30 -  NZXT 
00:42:36 -  Upstart
00:44:12 -  HIMS
00:45:26 -  Logitech 
00:46:40 - Out today
00:50:55 - Squad Up:Jake V(GothxDaddy)
00:52:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
